title: Improper representation as official inspection station
context: ยง286-29 Improper representation as official inspection station. Any person who shall in any manner represent that the business operated at any location is an official inspection station without a permit issued by the department under section 286-27, or any person other than a person operating an inspection station under a permit granted by the department who issues a certificate of inspection shall be fined not more than $1,000 or imprisoned not more than one year, or both. [L 1967, c 214, pt of ยง2; HRS ยง286-29; am L 1968, c 48, ยง2&copy;]
